entries.meaning: One who commits adultery: a spouse who has sex with a non-spouse
examples: Under the canon-law rule, a married participant is an adulterer and an umarried one is a fornicator.

entries.meaning: A male adulterer specifically, opposite adulteress referring to female ones.
examples: I become an adulterer and remain an adulterer when, by choice, I freely adopt the proposal to have sex with someone other than my wife.
